```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
library(tmap) # for interactive graph
library(gstat) # for kriging
library(stars) #grid for new location predictions
```

## Read in data
```{r}
ca_counties <- read_sf(here("data", "ca_counties"), layer = "CA_Counties_TIGER2016") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(name)

st_crs(ca_counties) # "EPSG",3857


oil_spill <- read_sf(here("data", "oilspill"), layer = "Oil_Spill_Incident_Tracking_%5Bds394%5D") %>% 
  clean_names()

st_crs(oil_spill)  # "EPSG",3857

```

## now lets combine into graphs
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = ca_counties) +
  geom_sf(data = oil_spill, size = .5)

tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(oil_spill) + 
  tm_dots()

```
